title: Major plumbing headache haunts $13 billion U.S. carrier off the coast of Venezuela
description: The crew of USS Ford is struggling to handle sewage problems on board the Navy's newest carrier.
content: The crew of USS Ford is struggling to handle sewage problems on board the Navy's newest carrier.
